mobx-fm

Mobx driven form management tool.

Get Started →

Easy

Simple way to create forms, use validations and watch states.

Reactivity

Driven by mobx, field level update.

Flexible

Can register virtual fields that only has validations with form states, not has value.

Virtual Fields

Can register virtual fields that only has validations with form states, not has value.

UI Independent

Not bound to any UI libraries, can use form instance outside the components.

React Friendly

Use `mobx-fm-react` with React, can easly integration with any UI libraries.
